definition: a structure consisting of a room or set of rooms at a single position along a vertical scale
details:
noun
- a structure consisting of a room or set of rooms at a single position along a vertical scale
= synonyms: level
- a piece of fiction that narrates a chain of related events
- a record or narrative description of past events
= example: a record or narrative description of past events
= synonyms: account
- a short account of the news
= synonyms: account, report, news report, write up
- a trivial lie
= synonyms: taradiddle, tarradiddle, fib, tale
- a message that tells the particulars of an act or occurrence or course of events
= synonyms: narrative
